description.narrative: The Development Objective is to improve the system of in-service teacher training and to strengthen themanagement of human resources in the education sector in São TomE and Principe.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Adopt the Project Implementation Manual | Description :The Recipient has adopted the updated ProjectImplementation Manual in form and substance satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :30-Jan-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule II. Section 1.D. - PIM | Description :The Recipient, through AFAP, shall: (i) take all action requiredto carry out the Project in accordance with the provisions and requirements set forth or referred to in the PIM; (ii) submitrecommendations to IDA for its consideration for changes and updates ofPIM as they may become necessary or advisable duringimplementation and not assign, amend, abrogate or waive the PIM | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Schedule II. Section A.2 | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than six (6) months after the EffectiveDate, cause AFAP to recruit external auditors for the purpose, in accordance with the provisions of Section III of this Schedule |Due Date :31-Mar-2015

Finance Agreement :Schedule II. Section I.A.3 - Project Steering Committee | Description :The Recipient shall maintain, throughoutProject implementation, a Project steering committee under terms of reference satisfactoryto the Association vested withresponsibility for providing overall technical guidance and oversight of Part 1 of the Project, withcomposition and mandate inaccordance with the PIM. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Schedule II. Section IE - Work Plan and Budget | Description :Prepare and furnish to IDA a work plan and budgetfor the following calendar year by November 30 of each year of the Project. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule II. Section II.A. - Project Reports | Description :Client shall submit progress reports every calendarsemester | Frequency :SemiAnnual

Finance Agreement :Schedule II. Section II.B.2 - Interim unaudited financial reports | Description :The Recipient shall prepare andfurnish to the Association not later than forty-five (45) days after the end of each calendar quarter, interim unaudited financialreports for the Project covering the quarter acceptable to IDA. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule II. Section II.B.3 -- financial statements audited | Description :Financial statements covering the FYmust be audited. These should be provided to IDA no later than 6 months following the end of the FY | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule II. Section II.B.4 - Recruit external auditors | Description :In order to ensure the timely carryingout of the audits referred to in this Section II.B, the Recipient shall, not later than six (6) months after the Effective Date,cause AFAP to recruit external auditors | Due Date :20-Nov-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule II. Section III.D - Procurement Plan | Description :The Procurement Plan shall set forth thosecontracts which shall be subject to the IDA's Prior Review. All other contracts shall be subject to Post Review by theAssociation. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Subsidiary Agreement between AFAP and the MoF | Description :Subsidiary Agreement between AFAP and the MoF meansthe agreement referred to in Section I.B of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement pursuant to which the Recipient shall make theproceeds of the Financing available to the Project Implementation Entity. | Due Date :30-Jan-2014

Finance Agreement :The GPE Co-Financing Agreement has been executed and delivered | Description :Co-financing means the amount ofone million, one hundred thousand Dollars, to be provided by IDA to assist in financing the Project. | Due Date :30-Jan-2014
